content: आस्फल्, --स्फुल् {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> or {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to flap, rock or shake; to strike or press against; आस्फालितं यत्प्रमदाकराग्रैः <ls>R. 16. 13</ls>; पयोराशेरोघः प्रलयपवनास्फालित इव <ls>U. 5. 9</ls> lashed, stirred; <ls>Nāg. 1</ls>; शिलायामास्फालितः <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To twang; धनुरास्फालयन् <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To sound, play upon (as a lute), strike; वीणामास्फालयंतीं <ls>K. 131</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 9.</ls> {@--4@} To rend assunder, tear in pieces.
